downloadDescription: Suggested agenda to facilitate a technical briefing.
detailsSection:
The goal of the technical briefing session is to:
  1. Set solution context, demonstrate Lync’s capabilities across the Unified Communications stack
  2. Deliver the required Lync technical insight appropriate to a wide variety of technical levels and audiences
  3. Articulate what is possible and supported using published Lync Reference Topologies
  4. Identify technical and operational dependencies that will influence deployment options
  5. Debunk competitors' myths
  6. Validate assumptions or assertions from Unified Communications (UC) Strategy Workshop (i.e. Lync Server or Lync Online)
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
